Activate 2 Interact

Opening this vial releases a mighty gust, forming into a fearsome Huge elemental hurricane. The elemental breathes a @Template[type:cone|distance:30] of air. Each creature in the cone must succeed at a @Check[type:fortitude|dc:28] save or be knocked away from the elemental. A creature knocked into a solid object stops moving and takes @Damage[4d6[bludgeoning]].

Critical Success The creature is unaffected.

Success The creature is pushed 10 feet.

Failure The creature is pushed 20 feet.

Critical Failure The creature is pushed 20 feet and knocked @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Prone].

Craft Requirements Supply magical residue from a slain elemental hurricane.
